title: AI Dataset & Model Download Issues
description: Troubleshoot network slowness and failures when downloading large AI models or datasets.

steps.title: Check Global Proxy / VPN
steps.instruction: Disable company VPN or check proxy settings in your terminal (HTTP_PROXY/HTTPS_PROXY). Large downloads often fail over restrictive VPNs.

steps.title: Use Local Mirrors
steps.instruction: If downloading from HuggingFace or similar, check if your organization has a local Artifactory mirror or cache.

steps.title: Resume Download with CLI
steps.instruction: Use 'wget -c' or 'curl -C -' to resume interrupted downloads instead of starting from scratch.

steps.title: Check DNS Stability
steps.instruction: Switch to a stable DNS (like 8.8.8.8) if the model provider's domain is failing to resolve intermittently.

steps.title: Verify Disk Space for Extraction
steps.instruction: Ensure you have 2x the model size in free space. Downloads often fail during the extraction/unzipping phase due to low space.
